member.name: M:PaikRichStock.UcForm.Bar.PintaDegradado(System.Drawing.Color[],System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs,System.Int32[])
member.param: Percent array to show. It can be one or two. First shows bar percent and second shows target percent. If only one percent is passed and it's cero, it will fill all cell width with the glass bar.
